code: import Types from'./user-types';export var googleSignInStart=function googleSignInStart(){return{type:Types.GOOGLE_SIGN_IN_START};};export var emailSignInStart=function emailSignInStart(emailAndPassword){return{type:Types.EMAIL_SIGN_IN_START,payload:emailAndPassword};};export var signInSuccess=function signInSuccess(user){return{type:Types.SIGN_IN_SUCCESS,payload:user};};export var signInFailure=function signInFailure(error){return{type:Types.SIGN_IN_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var checkUserSession=function checkUserSession(){return{type:Types.CHECK_USER_SESSION};};export var signOutStart=function signOutStart(userData){return{type:Types.SIGN_OUT_START,payload:userData};};export var signOutSuccess=function signOutSuccess(){return{type:Types.SIGN_OUT_SUCCESS};};export var signOutFailure=function signOutFailure(error){return{type:Types.SIGN_OUT_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var signUpStart=function signUpStart(userCredentials){return{type:Types.SIGN_UP_START,payload:userCredentials};};
